name: Denese Smith
text: Friendly Staff,  prompt service and our order was prepared well. They have improved greatly over the past year. At one point, we stopped going bc the product looked hastily made and unappetizing. Maybe better training or new staff, whatever they're doing, it's working, keep up the good work!

name: Wendy Freeman
text: Took the grand children to lunch because, well, they like pizza. The cost for an all you can eat lunch buffet was very reasonable for adults and children. The had a good variety of pizza and a small salad bar. The staff worked hard to keep …More

name: Pilar Difference
text: Great place for pizza buffet on certain nights. Friendly and attentive staff. Always clean.

name: Alison Catron
text: I  work there. Its an awesome work place. The managers and the other employers are very understanding and are amazing co-workers!!

name: Lamia Pamela
text: My pizza was almost 2 hours late after i ordered it. They are very slow.

name: Andrew Ferris
text: My food was late and it was cold plus the delivery guy stole my dollar I didn’t tell him he could keep it he just walked off plus they won’t answer the phone

name: Christian Becker
text: Building is old style but in great shape. Pasta was excellent but make sure to ask for fresh breadsticks. Ours were old and cold. If they had been hot and fresh, 5 stars. Lunch Buffet is only M-F, not weekends. Service was very good.

name: Donna Thacker
text:
My Dad is a resident at Oakwood. This
has become our favorite place to
eat lunch in Bedford. Only $6.99 …More

name: Mary Mason
text: Walked in lady said seat yourself.  Sat there for a good 10 mins or so without be recognized.  So decide to get up and get salad finally about another 10 mins server comes over and gets drink order. 530 is the  buffet  there was no cheese for the salad and no pizza. Very poor service one server. Wont be back no time soon.

name: wayne walker
text: One of the best pizza joints in bedford. Awesome pizza everytime we order. Breadsticks are good as well. Stuffed crust is to die for.

name: Elisabeth Castaldini
text: I just love their pizza. Their crust is soooo goood, and they're not cheap on cheese.

name: Steve Kraft
text: It is what it is,  decent chain pizza

name: Chuck Steinbruck
text: Great pizza in Bedford! And great service from Gail!

name: Sarah
text: There stuffed crust pizza is lacking. Example the crust is paper thin and weak. Plus the pizza itself is limited due to the crust being so big.

name: MissCSA Ash-Leigh Harlow
text: Great Pizza love the meat lovers and the super supreme

name: robert ramos
text: Ordered 2 large 2 topping pan style pizzas with garlic butter crust. There was minimal sauce on the pizzas and NO GARLIC BUTTER on the crusts. Driest pizza I have ever tasted.Had reservations about ordering from this Pizza Hut. I should have trusted my instincts and ordered Dominos.

name: Ralph Lonas
text: Pizza is good, service is great.

name: Margie Berry
text: Not the cleanest. But our server was nice. And the food was good

name: Larry Frazier
text: Good deal on the pizza and good service..

name: Nick McGuire
text: Food is good and we really enjoy the salad bar.

name: Mark Everett
text: They only table service Pizza Hut left in this area. The food is good.

name: Steve Mills
text: These guys are always spot on for us. Pizza and bread sticks prepared perfectly every time. The staff is also always friendly and polite. We try to visit here every time we are in the Bedford area to visit family. …More

name: Brandon Heck
text: Lady at the register was more interested in watching videos on YouTube than taking care of customers.

name: Nina Scott
text: The food was so awful. We tipped our server Amanda and left. She was great and we couldnt even get upset with her because it was the quality of the food..all of the toppings were dry and old tasting. Crust tasted like pure oil. It was an awful experience. Just awful minus the service..again she was great!

name: Jared Arrington
text: Please use plastic gloves when making pizzas. I watch you put toppings on 6 pizzas including mine, with your bare hands!!!!!

name: Old Guy
text: Ate the lunch buffet. Ok as always

name: Ashley
text: Prepare to wait.  Our order was wrong. Had to wait thirty minutes after the time to pick up. Plus it was on the burnt side.

name: Mike Woody
text: Shame we have to drive 25 miles to get a Quality Pizza Hut Pizza cooked exactly and topped exactly as they advertise. Bedford Pizza Hut is awesome!

name: Calvin Chadwell
text: Need to Use Kraft cheese in the poppers and says a cheap cheese.

name: Todd Friess
text: The food was ok. Hot and what we expected  but the place coulduse a really good cleaning.  Tables were sticky. Dead fly on window seal and ants coming in the window at the table we were sitting at. The waitstaff was alright. And please get …More

name: Jason Overstreet
text: Bedford pizza hut has always been great

name: Carrie Akers
text: Seems alright. Fast service dining in. However, if you call in, you have to wait a while for your food. I had to wait an additional ten minutes for pizza that was supposed to be ready fifteen minutes after I called. They hadn't put the pizza in the oven before I got there. The pizza is good though.

name: Tina Bowyer
text: Great pizza and I placed my order online and it was ready right on time!!

name: Dawson Davis
text: The wait staff was super helpful very friendly and polite she really are into tip!

name: Rich Haney
text: Service was fantastic salad bar was great pizza was a little bit old but we arrived as buffet was ending about 1:25pm our server made sure we got hot fresh desert that was great. We definitely we be back.

name: june lacy
text: Big disappointment. Pizza bar not stocked well unless you like cheese pizza. One choice of dissert. Used to be so much better

name: Nancy Renalds
text: If I could give a 1/4 star that would be all they would get. Manager very loud talking about her life and how much she is or should I say how little she made. I went in for the lunch buffet, I was the first and only customer,  nothing but …More

name: Martha Blair
text: Enjoyed the buffet Tues.night and food was good! So reasonably priced! Aaron, our server, was  great and most attentive !

name: Lawan Thornhill
text: Our order was sent to Arkansas! We're in Virginia! There were two more customers whose orders were sent out west as well. This order system does NOT work.

name: James Turner
text: Wanted a quick supper and thay had a Buffet,was great.

name: Ron Anderson
text: Food was hot and fresh

name: Elizabeth
text: I have never gotten cold or bad food from here. The employees are friendly. I always get carry out and it usually only takes about fifteen to twenty minutes to get my food.

name: Jennifer Smith
text: Pizza Hut has a buffet for lunch 11:30-1:30 it's priced very affordably and has a variety of options with a salad bar. We had a very nice waitress and offered a to go cup of my drink I like the atmosphere it's very relaxing.

name: Katherine Jones
text: Good salad bar.

name: Brenda Burnett
text: It's been awhile since I've eaten pizza at Pizza Hut. The pizza sauce is acid reflux friendly so a five star rating for the food. They deserve another five star for being courteous & friendly. I will visit again.

name: Nathan Hunzeker
text: The buffet was fresh and affordable. Great place for a quick bite under $10.

name: Robb
text: I called twice someone kept picking up the phone and hanging it up I will take my business elsewhere

name: Raymond
text: Back in the day this was a good place. Now they seem focused on delivery and not so much the dining area.  The buffet when they have it is dried out and not much selection.

name: Donald LaPrad
text: Great food and the lunch buffet is great!

name: Karen Zylstra
text: Haven't been to this restaurant in years. Still dirty. Saw a worker drop a slab of bread sticks on the floor and put it back with the others. Service is friendly enough but the place needs a face lift and a good cleaning. Will not return.

name: Genn Barrett
text: I haven't been to Pizza Hut often since the one in my area closed. The pizza was decent but the breadsticks were lukewarm when they came to the table and our waitress didn't really seem happy to be working.

name: Michael Hylton
text: It was terrible. They forgot to bring my pizza then took a hour to get it back out to me. Then I got food poising from the one they brought.... I was nice to them about the whole thing and didn't raise my voice or talk down and they still got me sick. Will be sticking to dominos from now on.
